entry.title: hirobanex/QudoSample
entry.summary:
DB BASED JobQueue Distribution Qudo Sample

install

  • setup your perl env.(using like perlbrew,cpanm).
  • setup your mysql env.

cpanm --installdeps .

perl script/create_db.pl
